title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 6650.1 - Purpose and scope
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 6650.1 - Purpose and scope

State Regulations
(a) The New York State Office for the Aging follows the purposes and procedures of
the State Freedom of Information Law (FOIL). (b) These regulations provide information
concerning the procedures by which records may be obtained. (c) Personnel shall furnish to the public the
information and records required by the Freedom of Information Law, as well as
records otherwise available by law. (d) Any conflicts among laws governing public
access to records shall be construed in favor of the widest possible
availability of public records. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
6650.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
